whenConductingAnStoMany: When conducting an STO, many factors must be considered. But one of the most important is the choice of jurisdiction.
whatInfluencesTheChoiceOf: What influences the choice of jurisdiction:
featuresOfYourProjectOr: Features of your project or its ideas
levelOfLegislativeConsolidationOf:
Level of legislative consolidation of the terms and rules
necessary for the STO project
rulesOnThePublicityOf: Rules on the publicity of the placement of security tokens
theNeedToConductA: The need to conduct a legal analysis of the project
legalIsComplicatedWeWould: Legal is complicated, we would like to help you
